section.title: Moving from DVR deployments to non_DVR
section.para: If you have an older deployment of &productname; which is using DVR as a default and you are attempting to move to non_DVR, follow these steps:

step.para: Remove all your existing DVR routers and their workloads. Make sure to remove interfaces, floating ips and gateways, if applicable.
step.screen: &prompt.ardana;openstack router remove subnet ROUTER-NAME SUBNET-NAME/SUBNET-ID &prompt.ardana;openstack floating ip unset â€“port FLOATINGIP-ID PRIVATE-PORT-ID &prompt.ardana;openstack router unset ROUTER-NAME -NET-NAME/EXT-NET-ID

step.para: Before you create any non_DVR router make sure that l3-agents and metadata-agents are not running in any compute host. You can run the command openstack network agent list to see if there are any neutron-l3-agent running in any compute-host in your deployment.
